name: Turrisi Flight Training
about: Turrisi Flight Training, located in Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, is a premier flight school led by Chief Flight Instructor Brian Turrisi, MD, CFII. With extensive experience and a passion for flying, Brian provides comprehensive flight instruction for both private and commercial pilots. The school offers a range of training opportunities, including ground school, biennial flight reviews, and instrument proficiency checks. Students learn essential skills in navigation, safety, and various aspects of aviation. Dedicated to fostering a safe and supportive learning environment, Turrisi Flight Training is committed to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced pilot, Turrisi Flight Training is your trusted partner in the skies.
